title: 9.3 Shakespeare Monkey Example
description: Part 3 of the Genetic Algorithm series is dedicated to the Shakespeare Monkey Example. In this video, I use the evolutionary concepts from the previous video to compute a problem that a brute force algorithm wouldn't be able to solve.

timestamps.title: Exploring the interface of this sketch.
Let's change the mutation rate to be 0.
What play around with the population?
Is a larger mutation rate better?

codeExamples.title: Shakespeare monkey example
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of using a genetic algorithm to perform a search
